events.name: Jacksonville State Gamecocks at Michigan State Spartans

headlines.description: Connor Cook threw three touchdown passes in the first quarter -- and withstood a hit to his leg that left him momentarily hobbled -- to help No. 8 Michigan State to an easy 45-7 victory over Jacksonville State on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Michigan St. cruises after Cook injury scare

headlines.description: Hill leads BYU over UConn, spoiling Diaco's debut
